website_summaries.verdict: The best option for dogs and horses.
pros: This cedar bedding expands significantly and has a classic cedar scent that masks odors well
The cedar does a good job of deterring ticks, fleas, and flies while offering comfortable bedding for your animals
cons: As far as cedar chips go, this is on the more expensive end

customer_reviews.title: Large chips. Less dust.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this cedar bedding for my hens to lay their eggs in. It has kept the eggs from cracking and it smells of fresh cedar. The chips are large and provide great cushioning with less dust.
customer_reviews.author: Meandiet

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for bug repellent for my closets, it smells amazing! It would be very messy to use as pet bedding, though. If my dogs lay on this, it would be all over the house. They would smell good, though :-D
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hunter Uhl

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: Our guinea pigs enjoy digging in it and the cage area smells nice. I'm love this stuff. (Note that the package is big and really packed tight. It's a win for me but be aware. My little kid can't dig any out until the package is about 1/4 full.)
customer_reviews.author: Emily K. Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: What can one say about a bale of cedar shavings. They were what I was expecting, they are nicely sized cedar shavings with a nice cedar aroma, for the dog's outside area. I was unable to locate any in the local pet stores and such, which I thought was odd. I did find one location, after ordering these and that price was about the same, so I guess the price is OK too.
customer_reviews.author: StoneBull

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: Ships in a large bag that has the compressed shavings in a smaller (2 cu ft) form. Once you open it and start to remove the shavings to pack into bedding it expands and becomes a lot more (5 cu ft.) This is great stuff and stops fleas immediately. They HATE cedar shavings. The smell is pleasant, and dogs and even cats like it. You're doing them a favor by making them bedding filled with cedar shavings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Not for use in Tortoises bedding
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our tortoises bedding and Myrtle would not stay in her house. Not sure if she doesn't like the smell or feel of the bedding. But decided to dump it out and use paper bedding which she loves.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for chicken coops.
customer_reviews.text: We use for chicken coop and smells great. Highly recommend for coops!
customer_reviews.author: Woodfarmsllc30

customer_reviews.title: Natures flea deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: Did what I bought them for! Got rid of the fleas pestering my pretty girl. She can sleep and nap in peace now. When the scent starts to fade I clean her house and memory foam pad, (she has arthritis), and she’s back to good.
customer_reviews.author: MississippiHoney

customer_reviews.title: love the smell of these shavings!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on the bottom of my birdcage, they work perfectly and the cedar smell is nice also. Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: use these for our dogs. it keeps their kennel fresh and also deters some flies
customer_reviews.author: Outfitter

customer_reviews.title: Used it outside as bug repellent
customer_reviews.text: The animal control came to pick up a dog and was wondering why I had cedar on the lawn. It has a distinct smell.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey W.

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box additive
customer_reviews.text: I use cedar as an additive to kitty litter. Helps box odor. I also use as mulch around flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Gee

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for what you get but wish it didnt wasnt as dusty and some products
customer_reviews.author: an dres

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Product is great ,smells great ,I use it in my outside cat catio
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Same bedding as Petsmart or Walmart so had no issues with quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Best bedding for a dog house...
customer_reviews.text: I have two large igloo dog houses, for my two outside dogs... There are no odors in the houses but cedar, and the chips insulate the floor... In fact the dogs smell like cedar... Extremely satisfied with the product...
customer_reviews.author: Henry W Stout

customer_reviews.title: Bugs gotta go
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell..I was told not to use in enclosed cage, like aquarium, because fumes are harmful to pet if the do not have fresh air..great for kennels or open wire cage with ventilation
customer_reviews.author: del kerber jr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about chew proof, it is for my Dogs. Love this product and the pricing
customer_reviews.author: Audrey S Foote

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Super fresh scent.very absorbent and pretty to boot.fantastic price and delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Our pets love cedar bedding
customer_reviews.text: We love this stuff and so do our pets. It's cool in summer, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby H

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quick delivery. We actually use in our fireplace to freshen the air and absorb burnt ash odor It also is safe to burn when we start a new log fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: We used for bedding in our Great Dane’s outside kennel
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Louise Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the convince of having this shipped to my door.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog beds!
customer_reviews.text: I would of gave them 5 stars but the bag is not resealable
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Fishwick

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the rest of my order? I got the Whole bill and only half the
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it if my order showed up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates musty orders.
customer_reviews.text: Used to eliminate musty odor in my father-in-laws basement in Exeter, NH.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Rip-Off!!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY small amount of bedding for the price. Walmart sells a bag that is 141L for $9. This is a rip-off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Silver

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.  Contents were low quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a big disappointment! Finding things like in the posted photograph, simply confirmed a low quality product. I did not expect bark or saw dust. Finally, the volume of material was on the slim side. Overall, I was disappointed and would not buy from this merchant again. I would never use this for my wonderful dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Rip off and con artists.
customer_reviews.text: This was nothing but a rip off. Bag size of a lunch bag. Low quality. They take advantage of people with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm a busy mom and in a hurry ordered this thinking "that's about what I spend at a brick and mortar store." well I was wrong the size I usually get is about 4 times as big. I will admit it's my fault for not being more diligent about checking the size but for anyone wonder was 24L is... its small.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great for feral cat shelters!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have 2 stray cats that I’ve care for over years of cold, Cleveland winters. I had a shelter built for them and added hay to their bedding. I recently added these cedar chips which adds warmth, softness and insect control. They love it and it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Small bag
customer_reviews.text: Go to your local feed stores for bedding you will get ten times the amount for the price. The horse on the package is. Mis leading it's a vary small bag and not even compressed.
customer_reviews.author: Seagrit

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how much Cedar I got for the small amount of money it went a long way and fortunately my cat won't sleep in the tote but if I throw the cedar under the port She lays in it
customer_reviews.author: Carole Rood

customer_reviews.title: Good product/Good delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cedar shavings to help keep litter boxes deodorized. Product was securely packed & delivered as promised. I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Darby

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t worth the money. I did better at tractor supply. Word to wise don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading! Don’t waste your money. Not enough cedar chips to fill a hamster cage much less for a horse? Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rich

customer_reviews.title: Small bag $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Very small amount of bedding. Grossly over priced.
customer_reviews.author: tastars

customer_reviews.title: This is a small bag for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Should have been more careful on the size and price. Extremely overpriced compared to past purchases at WM for much larger bags. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Wade M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It was very small bag and not worth the litter and it was very thin
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Comes packed in a tight bale. I use it as a ground cover/mulch here in the Land Of Perpetual Drought. Smells tremendous! Chips do not blow around much at all. My cats like to sit outside and I like what I've read about fleas not preferring the cedar chip smell. Overall very happy. Surprised and disappointed in the price, however, you might want to look elsewhere... at a Mal-Wart. $20 per bale?!?! That's absurdly high.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Too High
customer_reviews.text: This is Ridiculous for this, you can get the same size bag at Wal-Mart for $7.82. Not worth this price
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome and inexpensive. I'm using it as a ground cover around all of my raised beds. Love the smell, it's a great mulch, and amazing for restoring the ground to a healthy state. My hard, clay soil is unsuitable to grow anything directly into the ground. This will all change in a few years with the help of this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lugenbeel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, I use it, but it is less than half as expensive on Walmart.com
customer_reviews.author: Tim Shepard

product_meta.title: Pet's Pick Cedar Bedding, 5.0 cu ft for Dog Beds, Houses and Runs with MAXIMUM ODOR CONTROL + 100% GUARANTEE
product_meta.description:
Pet's Pick Cedar Bedding, 5.0 cu ft

The Pet's Pick Cedar Bedding in a 5.0 cu ft package is good for dog beds, houses and runs.

Pets stay odor-free, warm and dry.

The cedar chips are kiln dried for better absorption and to remove harmful bacteria and triple screened to remove irritating dust.

A sanitary bedding for your furry friends, it can keep things smelling good longer.

The cedar wood chips are an economical way to keep your pets comfortable yet sanitary in their areas.


Worry-free to clean up when soiled, the chips can be replaced readily as the package is lightweight and easy to handle:

• Ideal for dog beds, houses and runs
• Pets stay odor-free, warm and dry
• Cedar chips are kiln dried for better absorption and to remove harmful bacteria
• Triple screened to remove irritating dust

100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE

So, why think twice? order yours today.Thank you
feature_bullets: Ideal for DOG/CAT BEDS, HOUSES and RUNS
Pets stay ODOR-FREE, WARM and DRY
Cedar chips are kiln dried for BETTER ABSORPTION and to REMOVE HARMFUL BACTERIA
TRIPLE SCEENED to REMOVE irritating dust
WORRY-FREE to CLEAN up when soiled
